channel.title: effective django on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in effective django on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Technical documentation with Tut
item.description: Long running branches are a personal pet peeve of mine: I’d much rather put the effort into managing feature flags, etc than I would into merging a branch that’s diverged significantly.

item.title: Effective Django at OSCON Post-Mortem
item.description: I’ve been on the road a little more than a week now, back to back conferences.

item.title: “Effective Django” at OSCON
item.description: I’m going to be presenting my introductory Django tutorial, Effective Django at OSCON later this month.

item.title: “Effective Django” at PyCon 2013
item.description: PyCon (the US variation , at least), is about a month and half away, and once again I’m looking at the schedule of presentations and events and wondering how it is the community pulls it off every year.
